mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT PROJECT_SN , HNF_PLAN_SN , PRTCPNT_NM , PRTCPNT_EMPNO , TCHNLGY_GRAD, ROLE_CODE, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH , EXTRL_SERVC_AT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PARTCPTN_BEGIN_DE) , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PARTCPTN_BEGIN_DE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PARTCPTN_END_DE) , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PARTCPTN_END_DE, UPT_DT , UPT_ID FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} ORDER BY ROLE_CODE, TCHNLGY_GRAD DESC, HNF_PLAN_SN) A
mapper.insert: /* kr.co.dbvision.api.pjt.pmg.pjtpmg002.service.impl.Pjtpmg002Mapper.insertPjtProject */ INSERT INTO PJT_HNF_PLAN ( PROJECT_SN , HNF_PLAN_SN , PRTCPNT_NM , PRTCPNT_EMPNO , TCHNLGY_GRAD, ROLE_CODE, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH, EXTRL_SERVC_AT , PARTCPTN_BEGIN_DE, PARTCPTN_END_DE, REG_DT, REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{projectSn}, (SELECT NVL((MAX(HNF_PLAN_SN) + 1),0) FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn}), #{prtcpntNm}, #{prtcpntEmpno}, #{tchnlgyGrad}, #{roleCode}, #{partcptnManMonth}, #{extrlServcAt}, #{partcptnBeginDe}, #{partcptnEndDe}, SYSDATE, #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD , FNC_COMCODENM('C021',TCHNLGY_GRAD) AS TCHNLGY_GRAD_NM , SUM(A) AS MANA_MM , SUM(B) AS MANP_MM , SUM(B) - SUM(A) AS REMAIN_MM , SUM(C) AS PREV_MANA_MM FROM ( SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH A, 0 AS B, 0 AS C FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} UNION ALL SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD, 0 AS A, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH AS B, 0 AS C FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} UNION ALL SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD, 0 AS A, 0 AS B, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH AS C FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} AND ACMSLT_STDR_DE = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1),'YYYYMM') ) A GROUP BY TCHNLGY_GRAD UNION ALL SELECT '0' AS TCHNLGY_GRAD , '합계' AS TECH_CD_NM , SUM(A) AS MANA_MM , SUM(B) AS MANP_MM , SUM(B) - SUM(A) AS REMAIN_MM , SUM(C) AS PREV_MANA_MM FROM ( SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH A, 0 AS B, 0 AS C FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} UNION ALL SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD, 0 AS A, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH AS B, 0 AS C FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} UNION ALL SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD, 0 AS A, 0 AS B, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH AS C FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} AND ACMSLT_STDR_DE = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1),'YYYYMM') ) A ORDER BY TCHNLGY_GRAD DESC ) A

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD , FNC_COMCODENM('C021',TCHNLGY_GRAD) AS TCHNLGY_GRAD_NM , SUM(A) AS MANA_MM , '-' AS MANP_MM , SUM(B) - SUM(A) AS REMAIN_MM , SUM(C) AS PREV_MANA_MM FROM ( SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH A, 0 AS B, 0 AS C FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT WHERE TCHNLGY_GRAD NOT IN (SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} GROUP BY TCHNLGY_GRAD) AND PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} ) A GROUP BY TCHNLGY_GRAD UNION ALL SELECT '0' AS TCHNLGY_GRAD , '합계' AS TECH_CD_NM , SUM(A) AS MANA_MM , '-' AS MANP_MM , SUM(B) - SUM(A) AS REMAIN_MM , SUM(C) AS PREV_MANA_MM FROM ( SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH A, 0 AS B, 0 AS C FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT WHERE TCHNLGY_GRAD NOT IN (SELECT TCHNLGY_GRAD FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} GROUP BY TCHNLGY_GRAD) AND PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} ) A ORDER BY TCHNLGY_GRAD DESC ) A
mapper.insert: /* kr.co.dbvision.api.pjt.pmg.pjtpmg002.service.impl.Pjtpmg002Mapper.insertPjtProject */ INSERT INTO PJT_HNF_ACMSLT ( PROJECT_SN , HNF_ACMSLT_SN , PRTCPNT_NM , PRTCPNT_EMPNO , TCHNLGY_GRAD, ROLE_CODE, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH, EXTRL_SERVC_AT , ACMSLT_STDR_DE, REG_DT, REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{projectSn}, #{hnfAcmsltSn}, #{prtcpntNm}, #{prtcpntEmpno}, #{tchnlgyGrad}, #{roleCode}, #{partcptnManMonth}, #{extrlServcAt}, #{acmsltStdrDe}, SYSDATE, #{regId} )

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pjt.pmg.pjtpmg002.service.impl.Pjtpmg002Mapper.insertPjtProject */ INSERT INTO PJT_HNF_ACMSLT ( PROJECT_SN , HNF_ACMSLT_SN , PRTCPNT_NM , PRTCPNT_EMPNO , TCHNLGY_GRAD, ROLE_CODE, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH, EXTRL_SERVC_AT , ACMSLT_STDR_DE, REG_DT, REG_ID ) SELECT A.PROJECT_SN , (SELECT 'H' || LPAD(NEXT_ID + A.NUM ,19,0) FROM STM_IDS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'HNF_ACMSLT_SN'), PRTCPNT_NM , PRTCPNT_EMPNO , TCHNLGY_GRAD , ROLE_CODE , PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH, EXTRL_SERVC_AT, ACMSLT_STDR_DE, SYSDATE, REG_ID FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_SN, ROWNUM AS NUM, PRTCPNT_NM , PRTCPNT_EMPNO , TCHNLGY_GRAD , ROLE_CODE , PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH, EXTRL_SERVC_AT, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ACMSLT_STDR_DE||'01',+1), 'YYYYMM') AS ACMSLT_STDR_DE, SYSDATE, REG_ID FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} AND ACMSLT_STDR_DE = (SELECT MAX(ACMSLT_STDR_DE) FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn}) ) A

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pjt.pmg.pjtpmg002.service.impl.Pjtpmg002Mapper.insertPjtProject */ INSERT INTO PJT_HNF_ACMSLT ( PROJECT_SN , HNF_ACMSLT_SN , PRTCPNT_NM , PRTCPNT_EMPNO , TCHNLGY_GRAD, ROLE_CODE, PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH, EXTRL_SERVC_AT , ACMSLT_STDR_DE, REG_DT, REG_ID ) SELECT PROJECT_SN , #{hnfAcmsltSn} , PRTCPNT_NM , PRTCPNT_EMPNO , TCHNLGY_GRAD , ROLE_CODE , PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH , EXTRL_SERVC_AT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') , SYSDATE , REG_ID FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PROJECT_BEGIN_DE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PROJECT_BEGIN_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PROJECT_END_DE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PROJECT_END_DE FROM PJT_PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn}
mapper.insert: /* kr.co.dbvision.api.pjt.pmg.pjtpmg002.service.impl.Pjtpmg002Mapper.insertPjtProject */ INSERT INTO PJT_BUGT_PLAN ( PROJECT_SN, BUGT_PLAN_SN, ACNT_CODE, PRMPC_TY, BUGT_TIT, BUGT_AMT, BUGT_SUMMARY, BUGT_REGISTDT ) values ( #{projectSn}, (SELECT * FROM (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(BUGT_PLAN_SN)),0)+1 FROM PJT_BUGT_PLAN)), 'C071', '100', null, (SELECT SUM(TO_NUMBER(B.CODE_KOR_NM) * A.PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH) AS AMT FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN A, STM_CODE B WHERE A.PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} AND A.EXTRL_SERVC_AT = '0' AND B.CODEKIND_CODE = 'C073' AND A.TCHNLGY_GRAD = B.CODE), (SELECT LISTAGG(BUDG_REM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY BUDG_REM) AS BUDG_REM FROM ( SELECT B.CODE_KOR_NM || '(' || TRIM(TO_CHAR( A.CODE_KOR_NM , '999,999,999,999,999')) || '*' || PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH || ')' AS BUDG_REM FROM ( SELECT A.TCHNLGY_GRAD, TO_NUMBER(B.CODE_KOR_NM) AS CODE_KOR_NM, RTRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(A.PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH),'FM9990.9999'),'.') AS PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH FROM PJT_HNF_PLAN A, STM_CODE B WHERE A.PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} AND A.EXTRL_SERVC_AT = '0' AND B.CODEKIND_CODE = 'C073' AND A.TCHNLGY_GRAD = B.CODE GROUP BY A.TCHNLGY_GRAD, CODE_KOR_NM ) A, STM_CODE B WHERE B.CODE = A.TCHNLGY_GRAD AND B.CODEKIND_CODE= 'C021' )), SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO PJT_BUGT_ACMSLT ( PROJECT_SN, BUGT_ACMSLT_SN, ACNT_CODE, PRMPC_TY, BUGT_TIT, USE_AMT, USE_SUMMARY, BUGT_USEDT, REG_DT, REG_ID ) values ( #{projectSn}, (SELECT * FROM (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(BUGT_ACMSLT_SN)),0)+1 FROM PJT_BUGT_ACMSLT)), 'C071', '100', null, (SELECT SUM(TO_NUMBER(B.CODE_KOR_NM) * A.PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH) AS AMT FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT A, STM_CODE B WHERE A.PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} AND A.EXTRL_SERVC_AT = '0' AND B.CODEKIND_CODE = 'C073' AND A.TCHNLGY_GRAD = B.CODE AND ACMSLT_STDR_DE = #{acmsltStdrDe} ), (SELECT LISTAGG(BUDG_REM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY BUDG_REM) AS BUDG_REM FROM ( SELECT B.CODE_KOR_NM || '(' || TRIM(TO_CHAR( A.CODE_KOR_NM , '999,999,999,999,999')) || '*' || PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH || ')' AS BUDG_REM FROM ( SELECT A.TCHNLGY_GRAD, TO_NUMBER(B.CODE_KOR_NM) AS CODE_KOR_NM, RTRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(A.PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH),'FM9990.9999'),'.') AS PARTCPTN_MAN_MONTH FROM PJT_HNF_ACMSLT A, STM_CODE B WHERE A.PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} AND A.EXTRL_SERVC_AT = '0' AND B.CODEKIND_CODE = 'C073' AND A.TCHNLGY_GRAD = B.CODE AND ACMSLT_STDR_DE = #{acmsltStdrDe} GROUP BY A.TCHNLGY_GRAD, CODE_KOR_NM ) A, STM_CODE B WHERE B.CODE = A.TCHNLGY_GRAD AND B.CODEKIND_CODE= 'C021' ) ), (SELECT TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(#{acmsltStdrDe} || '01'),'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL), SYSDATE, #{regId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE STM_IDS SET NEXT_ID = NEXT_ID +1 WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'HNF_ACMSLT_SN'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJT_BUGT_ACMSLT ( PROJECT_SN , BUGT_ACMSLT_SN , ACNT_CODE , PRMPC_TY , BUGT_TIT, USE_AMT, USE_SUMMARY, BUGT_USEDT , REG_DT, REG_ID ) SELECT A.PROJECT_SN , (SELECT * FROM (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(BUGT_ACMSLT_SN)),0)+1 FROM PJT_BUGT_ACMSLT)), ACNT_CODE , PRMPC_TY , BUGT_TIT , USE_AMT , USE_SUMMARY, BUGT_USEDT, SYSDATE, REG_ID FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_SN, ROWNUM AS NUM, ACNT_CODE , PRMPC_TY , BUGT_TIT , USE_AMT , USE_SUMMARY, LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_CHAR(BUGT_USEDT,'YYYYMM')||'01',+1), 'YYYYMM')||'01')) AS BUGT_USEDT, SYSDATE, REG_ID FROM PJT_BUGT_ACMSLT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn} AND BUGT_USEDT = (SELECT MAX(BUGT_USEDT) FROM PJT_BUGT_ACMSLT WHERE PROJECT_SN = #{projectSn}) )A WHERE PRMPC_TY = '100'
